entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued March 04 at 3:26PM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Fire Danger for South Central Indiana Saturday... Near record warmth, southerly wind gusts near 40 MPH, low relative humidity values, and drying fine fuels thanks to recent warmth and drier weather will lead to elevated fire danger across portions of central Indiana on Saturday, particularly south central Indiana. Open burning is discouraged.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued March 04 at 3:21PM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Burning Danger Expected On Saturday... entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued March 03 at 6:06AM EST by NWS
